version_description:
1.优化k线切换速度
2.修复部分已知bug
Fix known bugs
Update verification process. Improve users experience.

1. Update Home page UI for better user experience.
2. Add new digital asset ETC to fulfil more investment needs.
3. New promotion for sign up to repay customers.
4. Fix some bugs.

1. Add all digital assets on market page
2. Enable ETC deposit and withdrawal sevice
3. Update some features
4. Fix some bugs

New market page.
Add Cryptocurrency-to-cryptocurrency trading.
Add funds transfer to Huobi.pro account.
Add withdrawal limit notice.
Add BCC/CNY trading
Add BCC/CNY trading
Fix known bugs
Add video authentication function
1.New user interface to improve user experience.

1、Page new revision, enhance the user experience.
2、Access speed increased significantly, the transaction more fluid.

1. Join Tradingview, can not see the status of landing plate
2. Login list of nationality and cell phone area code using different data
3. If the user security policy to open GA, then login to verify GA
4 trading style changes, the price input box to increase the corresponding button
5. Assets interface to add RMB equivalent
6. Quotes can enter the K line, log in and jump to the target page

1. Trading page New vertical Handicap style
2. Market page new section and RMB

Increase leverage account trading function
Account page to add leverage account display

1.The loading of the Margin page is improved.
2.Some translations are revised.
3.The style of the Balances page is changed.
Security Verification is added to Log In, Sign Up and Retrieve Password page.

1. Coin Basics are newly added.
2. User experience is improved.
3. Bugs are fixed.

1. Coin Basics are newly added.
2. User experience is improved.
3. Bugs are fixed.

1.The loading of the Margin page is improved.
2.Some translations are revised.
3.The style of the Balances page is changed.

Update: 3.3.4 Version
1. The Invitation Program is live.
2. Balances now support 7 valuation currencies.
3. French, Spanish, Russian and German versions are added.
4. "Contact us" is added in the "About us" module.
5. Other functions and style modifications.

1. Kline restructure.
2. OTC entrance is added.
3. Value estimation of single coin is added on the Balances page.
4. Function of fast withdrawal is added.
5. Other functions are optimized.

Version 3.4.0
1. OTC is optimized.
2. OTC account now can be viewed in the Balances.
3. IOTA deposit is available.
4. Other functions are improved.
5. Portuguese is newly added

1. Point Card is available.
2. OTC supports various payment methods and fiat money of many countries.
3. Kline is optimized.
4. Vietnamese is newly added.
5. Other functions are improved.

Upgrade: Version 3.4.6
1. HB10 is available.
2. HB10 swap-in and swap-out are available.
3. Thai is newly added.
4. User login failure in some regions is fixed.
5. Other functions are optimized.
修复系统已知bug，提高用户体验。

1.新增越南盾计价方式
2.法币交易功能优化
3.修复了一些bug

1.支持适配iOS12系统
2.支持适配iphone Xs和Xs max
3. 紧急修复了线上bug

1. Sorting function is added to the Markets page.
2. Discovery function is added.
3. More convenient deposit and withdrawal.
4. Kline charts are newly added in the Exchange page.
5. Fast entrance in the Exchange function.
6. Customization of indicators is available in the Kline charts.

1. Upgraded online customer support.
2. New layout for K-line charts with more stable and smoother experience.
Recent updates:
1.Optimize beginners' trading experience
2.Help Center Revised
3.Compatible with iOS13

Latest update: Rate display page optimized.
Recent updates:
1. support Turkish
2.Help Center Revised
3. Compatible with iOS13

Version 5.1.6 Update
Huobi Prime is supported.

1.Prompts of deposits and withdrawals are optimized.
2.Online customer service review function is improved.

1. Interface experience is optimized.
2. A number of bugs are found and fixed.
Identified system bugs have been fixed to improve user experience.

Version 5.1.2 Update.
1. Comprehensive upgrade of the Balances page.
2. Support for deposits & withdrawals of coins with multiple chains.
3. The system performance is optimized.
4. Chart settings can be saved now.

1. Withdrawal and deposit of stablecoin are opened.
2. Transfer function is optimized.
3. Brazilian Portuguese is added.
4. Bugs are found and fixed.

1. Interface experience is optimized.
2. A number of bugs are found and fixed.

1. One-click purchase is newly added. Own bitcoins easily.
2. The sharing function of contract profits is added. Share your feelings and be true to yourself.
3. All the bugs are fixed.
v4.2.3 All the bugs are fixed

Version 5.0.2 Update
1. Stop-limit orders are newly added
2. Home page is enriched with new contents.
3. Interfaces are designed in the Chinese New Year style
4. Performance is improved and bugs are fixed

Version 5.1.2 Update.
1. Comprehensive upgrade of the Balances page.
2. Support for deposits & withdrawals of coins with multiple chains.
3. The system performance is optimized.
4. Chart settings can be saved now.

Version 5.1.3 Update
1. Charts support screenshot sharing.
2. Users can share the app now.
3. Bugs are fixed.

Version 5.1.6 Update
Huobi Prime is supported.

Version 5.1.7 Update
1. One-click purchase function is optimized.
2. Accuracy of price conversion is improved.
3. Google Authenticator reset guide is newly added.
